sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './productdetails.css'; export const ProductDetails = () => { const product = { name: "Casual Shoes", category: "Sports", price: 100, offerPrice: 80, rating: 4, images: [ "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/prebuiltui/prebuiltui/main/assets/card/productImage.png", "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/prebuiltui/prebuiltui/main/assets/card/productImage2.png", "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/prebuiltui/prebuiltui/main/assets/card/productImage3.png", "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/prebuiltui/prebuiltui/main/assets/card/productImage4.png" ], description: [ "High-quality material", "Comfortable for everyday use", "Available in different sizes" ] }; const [thumbnail, setThumbnail] = React.useState(product.images[0]); return product && (

Trang chủ / Sản phẩm / {product.category} / {product.name}

{product.images.map((image, index) => (
setThumbnail(image)} className="thumbnail-item">
))}

{product.name}

{Array(5).fill('').map((_, i) => ( product.rating > i ? ( ★ ) : ( ☆ ) ))}

({product.rating})

MRP: ${product.price}

MRP: ${product.offerPrice}

inclusive of all taxes

About Product

    {product.description.map((desc, index) => (
  • {desc}
    • ))}
); };
